vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.15.24
§ Shebaniah = "increased by Jehovah"
1) a Levite who sealed the covenant with Nehemiah
2) a priest who sealed the covenant with Nehemiah
3) a 2nd Levite who sealed the covenant with Nehemiah
4) a priest appointed by David to blow with the trumpets before the ark of God
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a)   varios levitas; post exílico; (b)   sacerdote; post exílico \sacerdote; en tiempos del rey David
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
示巴尼 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在原文的意思是 "耶和華所加增的"
1) 在和尼希米所訂的公約上簽名的一位利未人
2) 在和尼希米所訂的公約上簽名的一位祭司
3) 另一位在和尼希米所訂的公約上簽名的利未人
4) 一位由大衛王指派負責在約櫃前吹號的祭司 (代上 15:24)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
示巴尼 这个阳性专有名词 人名在原文的意思是 "耶和华所加增的"
1) 在和尼希米所订的公约上签名的一位利未人
2) 在和尼希米所订的公约上签名的一位祭司
3) 另一位在和尼希米所订的公约上签名的利未人
4) 一位由大卫王指派负责在约柜前吹号的祭司 (代上 15:24)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Exile and Return, first mentioned at Neh.9.4
§ Shebaniah = "increased by Jehovah"
1) a Levite who sealed the covenant with Nehemiah
2) a priest who sealed the covenant with Nehemiah
3) a 2nd Levite who sealed the covenant with Nehemiah
4) a priest appointed by David to blow with the trumpets before the ark of God

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Exile and Return, first mentioned at Neh.10.4; also called Shecaniah (NIV: Shekaniah) at Neh.12.3;
Also named: she.khan.yah (שְׁכַנְיָהוּ "Shecaniah" H7935O)
§ Shebaniah = "increased by Jehovah"
1) a Levite who sealed the covenant with Nehemiah
2) a priest who sealed the covenant with Nehemiah
3) a 2nd Levite who sealed the covenant with Nehemiah
4) a priest appointed by David to blow with the trumpets before the ark of God

A man living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at Neh.10.12
§ Shebaniah = "increased by Jehovah"
1) a Levite who sealed the covenant with Nehemiah
2) a priest who sealed the covenant with Nehemiah
3) a 2nd Levite who sealed the covenant with Nehemiah
4) a priest appointed by David to blow with the trumpets before the ark of God
